Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Virginia Gov. Ralph Northam never made the statement attributed to him.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the threat by falsely attributing a threatening quote to Gov. Northam.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or proof to support the statement made.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Gov. Northam would order the National Guard to take extreme measures against those who refuse to comply with a potential gun ban, without any basis.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim can be explained as misinformation and a hoax targeting Gov. Northam due to his support for proposed gun regulations in Virginia.
